name: Shaherah Gaines
text: I order from this location all the time and have yet to have any complaints. Do they mess my food up from time to time, YES! But most importantly, I call and they apologize, replace food and re-deliver with 20 minutes! The Chicken Alfredo â€¦More

text: Ordered a 3 topping pizza with Bacon, Ham, and mushroom that tasted good. Not go heavy or to light on sauce. A good mixture of all toppings. We also ordered mozzarella sticks and they were the best Iâ€™ve ever had!!! Definitely recommend!!!! Also staff was very fun and welcoming! Will make a trip back for sure!

text: All of the Pizza Hut locations in Northeast Indiana are run by a single franchise owner. I have heard from good sources that he is the most successful franchise owner for Pizza Hut in the nation. The pizza is second to none and by far the most popular in town.
